description:
Donald is a young boy. He`s the son of rich parents. When going out, the servants even roll out a red carpet for them, so they won`t get dirty / need to step on the ground when entering their carriage. His mother brought him up very well and taught him, to help those in needs.
He meets Sara on the first of May, when she is out shopping for produce, dizzy from not having had any food for a longer period of time, and insists that she takes some money from him, to buy food for herself. This moment had to be the first time that Sara had to realize how poor and dependend of others she has become.
name: Donald
